name: Barclay Cottage Bed and Breakfast
overview:
Five room Victorian Cottage style bed and breakfast located in historic neighborhood of Virginia Beach, Virginia. Only two and a half blocks or about a 5 minute walk from the Boardwalk, beach, and Atlantic Ocean, it is close to all of the activities of the resort yet far enough removed to provide a peaceful respite from the hustle and bustle of the crowds.

Rooms individually and tastefully decorated with contemporary and Victorian furniture and memorabilia and all upscale amenities provided. Each room has cozy beds with crisp linens, thirsty Turkish towels and spa robes, makeup mirrors, hair dryers, and more. Full multi-course breakfast, snacks and hot and cold beverages 24/7. all beach equipment, bicycles, WIFI, guest business center, freshly baked cookies every afternoon, and off street parking, all included.
